<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Fleshgem](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1436)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** envision

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Originally developed as a body modification by [oreads](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=34), _fleshgems_ are crystals that can be implanted in the skin of a creature of any ancestry. While a _fleshgem_ can be applied anywhere on the body for cosmetic purposes, the most common usage among adventurers is to implant them at the base of the fingers, to be used like brass knuckles.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Fleshgem (Combat)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

These pointed crystal shards embedded in your fingers grant you a [fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) Strike that deals 1d6 piercing damage, is in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group, and has the [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits. _Combat fleshgems_ can be enhanced with the effects of [_handwraps of mighty blows_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441), as normal for an unarmed attack.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Fleshgem (Earthspeaker)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You siphon your fleshgem's power, and the earth around you erupts in crystal stalagmites.

<document level="2" id="action-1084" />
